user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to reply to me (mark@technotronix.com) about Eric'"'"'s recent absences and review Eric'"'"'s personal file in Gmail for the relevant information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Update on Eric’s Recent Absences

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please look into Eric’s recent absences and review his personal file stored in Gmail for any relevant details? When you have the information, kindly reply to me at mark@technotronix.com.

Thank you for your help.

Best regards,  
Mark

final_output:
